avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs may form in easterly to north-easterly aspects during snow showers on Tuesday and Thursday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Warming and rain on Monday night is expected to melt snow in the lowlands and may reach mountain elevations. Wind slabs may form in east to north-east aspects during snow showers on Tuesday and Thursday.  The older snow is stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á mánudagskvöld hlýnar með töluverðri rigningu. Á þriðjudag kólnar með suðvestan éljum. Á miðvikudag spáir éljum í norðanátt. Á fimmtudag er útlit fyrir SV-átt og él.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluffs fell in Kirkjubólshlíð and a small avalanche fell in Syðridalur on Sunday 2 March.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New wind slabs can be expected in mountains due to snowfall and snowdrift from variable winds. Avalanches are also possible due to the new snow that accumulates in the coming days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has added and drifted in recent days. Before that, there was relatively little snow, with old stiff and stable snow in mountains. Continuing snow showers and snowdrift from variable winds are forecast for the next few days. Wind slabs are expected to continue to build up in the mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjókoma í hvassri A-átt mánudagskvöld, með rigningu/slyddu á láglendi. SV él á þriðjudag. Éljagangi spáð á miðvikudag í hægum vindi og en snýst í NA-átt um nóttina. Éljagangur á fimmtudag í NA til A-átt.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Some new snow is in the area and wind slabs could form in the mountains.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Some new snow is in the area which has accumulated in gullies and lows in places. It will snow the night before Tuesday during E wind. Further wind slab formation is expected in the next few days. Older snow is considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: A-læg átt og snjókoma aðfaranótt þriðjudags. Snýst aftur í hvassa SV-átt með éljum. Seint á miðvikudag er útlit fyrir að það snúist í hæga N-A-læga átt með dálítilli snjókomu.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluff released in Magnúsartindur in Oddsskarð on Feb 26th. Multiple thin avalanches released in Seldalur and Fannardalur in Norðfjörður on Saturday morning, 22.2.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs could form at high elevations in the next few days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Little snow is at low elevations but slabs could be present in the mountains. Snowfall this week will most likely cause further wind slab formation on most aspects. Small wet sluffs could release on Tuesday. Older snow was mostly considered stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs could be present in most parts of the country.

weatherForecast.highlights: Snjóar í A-átt aðfaranótt þriðjudags en rignir ofan í nýsnævið á þriðjudagsmorgun. V-átt og bjart á þriðjudag. Seinnipart miðvikudags snjóar aftur, þá í N-átt. Á fimmtudag er útlit fyrir N-læga átt með snjókomu.
